attributes.action: To bring back the death sentence for murders and rapists and to chemically or physically castrae castrate child molesters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the death penalty should be brought back for those who are proven guilty beyond doubt of murder,attempted murder,rape and attempted rape . I also believe that me should castrated child molesters and if some how they reoffend they should be sentenced to death. Many argue that it breaches the guilty's "human rights" Which I find extremly wrong as what about there victims rights,In my opinion as soon as you violate another persons rights you forfeit your own.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
